DOC.brief_summary: Single repeat application autologous bone marrow-derived stem cell treat chronic post-infarction heart failure
DOC.brief_title: Compare Effects Single Versus Repeated Intracoronary Application Autologous Bone Marrow-derived Mononuclear Cells Mortality Patients With Chronic Post-infarction Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Improve mortality morbidity patient symptomatic chronic post-infarction heart failure full dose conventional medical device treatment include resynchronization therapy , single versus repeat intracoronary infusion autologous bone marrow-derived mononuclear cell .
